extendedInfo.description: The Guardian Android app delivers all the latest content from the Guardian to your phone or tablet. Read today's news, sport, comment and reviews. Explore our award-winning multimedia content with videos, podcasts and stunning picture galleries.Join the conversation: view, recommend, share and submit comments.Upgrade to the Premium Tier (69p a month) for access to Crosswords, an advert-free experience, and future exclusive features and content.Full feature list:- download your homepage and favourites for offline reading with the touch of a button, or schedule a daily download for a time that suits you- take part with comments and debate- subscribe to the premium tier for:  - the cryptic and quick crosswords delivered every day direct to your phone  - no adverts  - exclusive future features and content- live football scores, results and tables for hundreds of English, Scottish, European and international games- receive alerts for big news stories, exclusives, and goals from your favourite football teams- navigate by section, topic or contributor and discover related stories in an article - browse our award-winning audio and video content- save contributors, topics and sections to your favourites - add favourites to your homescreen with an expanded view or link- live, updating coverage of news and sport events- swipe through stunning full-screen picture galleries- share articles and galleries using the Android share menu Information about the permissions we request:http://www.theguardian.com/mobile/insideguardian/android-app-permissionsPrivacy policy:http://www.theguardian.com/help/privacy-policy

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: ...and improving all the time.  And finally the option to subscribe!  Thank you :)
reviews.author: Ben Willmott

reviews.title: New look?
reviews.comment: A whole new look would be nice to be honest
reviews.author: Ryan Curran

reviews.title: Yay Crosswords - But Can\'t Clear All Sections
reviews.comment: Yay, I can finally get back to Guardian crosswords on my mobile. Feels smoother than the old dedicated client, and more than happy to pay the 69p/month tarrif.  However, since I\'m here only for the crosswords, I\'d rather like to clear all the other sections from the homepage.  I can clear all but one, on clearing the final one the application crashes and restarts with all the sections loaded again.
reviews.author: Kian Ryan

reviews.title: Great, with some flaws
reviews.comment: The app is generally very good, easy to operate and looks nice, but scrolling within stories is horrible, both laggy and slow. Until that\'s fixed, I must stay with 4 stars...
reviews.author: Yuval Novik

reviews.title: Nice app but useless search
reviews.comment: The app seems to work well enough but the search (Find) functionality seems to be pretty useless. Maybe I\'m just misunderstanding but it seems you can only search for pre defined terms, not content in articles. If someone could explain how I could search for articles containing say \'bedroom tax\' from the app, I\'d be impressed
reviews.author: Chris Whittleston

reviews.title: Good apps...with reliable  news
reviews.comment: One of the best new apps
reviews.author: Aneel Koirala

reviews.title: Nagging
reviews.comment: Was fine the first day,  after an update all it does is nag for money. Uninstalling now.
reviews.author: Ariel Nieves

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: Mavailable.r news, reviews, opinions and most of all Sports analysis, top notch, please don\'t let this premium option take away from current content available
reviews.author: Tadhg Lane

reviews.comment: Widget please, it\'s android not shit ios
reviews.author: Yichen Hu

reviews.title: Perfect now without the ads
reviews.comment: What can I say, now it is the perfect news app.
reviews.author: Christof Damian

reviews.title: World\'s best source of news iimho
reviews.comment: Now just got better-looking. Slightly apprehensive about introduction of \'premium fee\'; that has a tendency to hide all but the headlines & weather after some time...
reviews.author: diederik klumper

reviews.title: Excellent!!!
reviews.comment: Surpurb app, worth more then 5*****. Completely blows all other uk newspaper apps out the water.  I had the uk times as a free orange swappable app, but not any longer as they think its ok for you to pay for it! Even though its far less superior and dated news updates.  No thanks. This doesn\'t get any better!! Thank you guardian!
reviews.author: Mark Davies

reviews.title: Fox News wannabe
reviews.comment: Heavily biased reporting. Lots of self-righteous journalism that that is rife with puerile elitism. Al Jazeera is the best app for unbiased world news, the guardian is just a bunch of whining dbags.
reviews.author: matthew mcguire

reviews.title: Much improved
reviews.comment: Happy to pay a small amount to ditch the ads! The best newspaper app there is
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: why..WHY !!
reviews.comment: why do you have ad\'s in international widely known  news app , i mean honestly that\'s soo low in beyond limits !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flashing adverts too intrusive!
reviews.comment: Now the subscription option is available, I give it 5 stars! And all for 69p a month - Bargain!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was good...
reviews.comment: ..while it lasted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing button
reviews.comment: I can\'t seam to find the button on this app marked \"send all data to NSA\"
reviews.author: Matthew Baynham

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Best news app available! Great variety of articles.
reviews.author: Marti Mclean

reviews.comment: Superb, and free
reviews.author: Mark Carter
